events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and the color looks different than shown on the website.
The customer's message includes a refund request and dissatisfaction with the product color and fit, categorizing this case as Refund.
Assigning the refund request case to the refund specialist team for proper handling and follow-up.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you want a refund for your recent jacket purchase. Let me assist you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way? This will help us process your refund request quickly.
Thank you for your reply. My order number is 123456789. The jacket has not been worn outside and still has the tags attached.
We have processed your refund request. Please ship the jacket back to us within 14 days using the prepaid return label we will email shortly.
I appreciate your help and the clear instructions on how to return the jacket. I will send it back as soon as possible.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The money should appear back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Closing your refund case. Thank you for your patience, and please feel free to contact us for any future needs.
